title: The Sergeant And The Billionaire
description: When passion stands in the way of revenge, what are you prepared to do in order to fulfill your mission?After being forcibly discharged from the military, Samantha "Sam" Wellington is angry, frustrated, and suffering from trauma-induced nightmares after losing the person she loved. Determined to execute her revenge, she prepares to reenter the military through any means necessary. In the process, she encounters a man named Leo, who just so happens to be an alluring New York billionaire. Sam is inexplicably drawn to him, and gradually, both him—and her underlying desires—become harder and harder for her to ignore.How long will Sam be able to keep this man at bay? Will Sam succeed in getting her revenge? It's a test that will push her desire for revenge—and passion—to its limits.
author: Colecia Ann
